Description: Four fragments of the body of probably one Clazomenian black figure painted pottery amphora. Women dancers. Purple for bottom border of skirt, white for flesh and patterning on skirt.
Curator's comments: BSA xlvii, 131-CII.3. Whereas it was previously thought that these fragments belong to the same vessel (Cook 1954), it is possible that they do not (S. Weber).
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 590, 5-8)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 155)
